statements: SELECT * FROM network_traffic_monitor ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT ip_address, mac_address FROM network_traffic_monitor WHERE data_usage > 1000;
SELECT ip_address, timestamp FROM network_traffic_monitor WHERE mac_address = 'AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:FF';
SELECT ip_address, data_usage FROM network_traffic_monitor WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM network_traffic_monitor;
SELECT ip_address, mac_address, timestamp, data_usage FROM network_traffic_monitor WHERE data_usage > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT ip_address, mac_address, timestamp FROM network_traffic_monitor WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.%' AND mac_address = '00:11:22:33:44:55';
SELECT ip_address, mac_address, timestamp, data_usage FROM network_traffic_monitor WHERE data_usage BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY data_usage DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT ip_address, SUM(data_usage) AS total_data_usage FROM network_traffic_monitor GROUP BY ip_address HAVING total_data_usage > 5000 ORDER BY total_data_usage DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ip_address) AS total_unique_ips, AVG(data_usage) AS avg_data_usage FROM network_traffic_monitor;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic;
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic WHERE packet_size > 1000;
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS packet_count FROM network_traffic GROUP BY source_ip;
SELECT threat_name, threat_description FROM security_threats WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT id, destination_ip, packet_size, timestamp FROM network_traffic ORDER BY packet_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic WHERE packet_size > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS total_packets FROM network_traffic GROUP BY source_ip HAVING total_packets > 5 ORDER BY total_packets DESC;
SELECT destination_ip, MAX(packet_size) AS max_packet_size FROM network_traffic WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01' GROUP BY destination_ip;
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS total_threats FROM security_threats INNER JOIN network_traffic ON security_threats.timestamp = network_traffic.timestamp GROUP BY source_ip ORDER BY total_threats DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM NetworkDevices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices WHERE device_id IN (2, 3, 5);
SELECT device_id, mac_address FROM NetworkDevices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action FROM NetworkLogs WHERE action = 'Alert' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT threat_id, threat_name FROM ThreatSignatures WHERE length(description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM NetworkDevices;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, mac_address FROM NetworkDevices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM NetworkLogs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT t.threat_name, l.action FROM ThreatSignatures t INNER JOIN NetworkLogs l ON t.threat_id = l.log_id;
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, data_usage FROM network_traffic_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM network_devices WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT description FROM security_threats WHERE severity = 'High' ORDER BY threat_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_type DESC;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS num_logs FROM network_traffic_logs GROUP BY device_id HAVING num_logs > 5;

SELECT t.threat_id, t.threat_type, s.severity FROM security_threats t JOIN threat_alerts a ON t.threat_id = a.threat_id JOIN network_devices d ON a.device_id = d.device_id WHERE d.device_type = 'Firewall' ORDER BY s.severity ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices WHERE device_id = 100;
SELECT ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'router';
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_id, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT traffic_id, source_ip, destination_ip, timestamp FROM network_traffic WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_type, event_description FROM security_events WHERE device_id = 101 ORDER BY event_type;
SELECT device_id, threat_type, threat_level FROM threat_analysis WHERE threat_level = 'High' AND threat_type LIKE '%ransomware%';
